translations.You were mentioned on \"{file}\", in a c: Ulitajwa kwenye "{file}", kwenye maoni ya akaunti ambayo imefutwa
translations.Files app plugin to add comments to file: Programu-jalizi ya Faili ili kuongeza maoni kwenye faili
translations.@ for mentions, : for emoji, / for smart: @ kwa mitajo, : kwa emoji, / kwa kichagua smart
translations.Failed to mark comments as read: imeshindwa kuweka alama kwenye maoni kama yamesomwa
translations.An error occurred while trying to edit t: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kujaribu kuhariri maoni
translations.An error occurred while trying to delete: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kujaribu kufuta maoni
translations.An error occurred while trying to create: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kujaribu kuunda maoni
